title: 求BossShop的变量
author: 叫我赖天王
txt_content: 就是直接在物品名字下面显示点券余额，钱的余额之类的

replies.author: Smaoll
replies.txt_content:
{:10_493:}我在搬运汉化帖和原帖并没有找到变量，
如果要变量我个人推荐使用 ChestCommand GUI
Variables

The variables can be used in COMMAND, LORE and NAME.

{player} (will be replaced by the name of the player who clicked).
{world} (the name of the world you are in).
{online} (n° of online players).
{max_players} (n° of server's slots).
{money} (amount of money, you must have Vault). 以上是CC的变量，也许你可以试试加入到BossShop
